statements: DELETE FROM ManufacturingEmissions WHERE emission_type = 'CO2' AND emission_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM ManufacturingEmissions WHERE id = 3 AND process_name = 'Chemical Processing';
DELETE FROM ManufacturingEmissions WHERE emission_type = 'CO2' AND emission_amount > 1000;
DELETE FROM emissions_data WHERE date < '2022-01-01' AND emission_quantity > 1000;
DELETE FROM Process_Records WHERE emission_amount > 1000 AND emission_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM Manufacturing_Plants WHERE carbon_emission < 50 OR plant_location = 'New York';
